mapper.select:
select id as id, item_id as itemId, produc_place as producPlace, foot_period as footPeriod, brand as brand, factory_name as factoryName, factory_address as factoryAddress, packaging_method as packagingMethod, weight as weight, storage_method as storageMethod, eat_method as eatMethod, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime from items_param
and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into items_param( item_id, produc_place, foot_period, brand, factory_name, factory_address, packaging_method, weight, storage_method, eat_method, created_time, updated_time) values( #{itemId}, #{producPlace}, #{footPeriod}, #{brand}, #{factoryName}, #{factoryAddress}, #{packagingMethod}, #{weight}, #{storageMethod}, #{eatMethod}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
mapper.update:
update items_param
item_id=#{itemId},
produc_place=#{producPlace},
foot_period=#{footPeriod},
brand=#{brand},
factory_name=#{factoryName},
factory_address=#{factoryAddress},
packaging_method=#{packagingMethod},
weight=#{weight},
storage_method=#{storageMethod},
eat_method=#{eatMethod},
created_time=#{createdTime},
updated_time=#{updatedTime}
